snippet: SAFER--Morley. We note with sorrow the passing of our longtime member Morley Safer and extend sincerest condolences to his bereaved family. Rabbi Angela W. Buchdahl, President Abigail Pogrebin, Central Synagogue of New York City 1/3
lead_paragraph: SAFER--Morley. We note with sorrow the passing of our longtime member Morley Safer and extend sincerest condolences to his bereaved family. Rabbi Angela W. Buchdahl, President Abigail Pogrebin, Central Synagogue of New York City 1/3
